title: Dog barking mad to join his pooch pals smashes through porch screen despite the door being wide open
text:
This is the moment a dog called Cooper is so eager to join his pals outside he jumps straight through a screen, ignoring an open door.

In a clip shared Tuesday, the Australian Shepherd is seen watching three other pooches outside in Orlando, Florida.

Footage from the camera placed indoors shows the pet barking inside while his friends respond in the back yard.

A clip shows Australian Shepherd, Cooper, get 'really excited' to join dogs outside

Eventually, it all gets too much for the solo pup who makes a break for it.

Cooper runs towards the outside world, crashing through the screen.

Oddly, he ignored the wide open door to his left.

The pooch runs across room to get to the other furry animals in the footage from October 14

'My Australian Shepherd, Cooper, got really excited, ran through the screen and did a backflip,' the owner told Viral Hog.

The incident took place October 14.

Luckily, Cooper only had to shake off his embarrassment following the belly flop on the grass.

'He did not suffer any known injuries from this,' the owner said.
description: Australian Shepherd, Cooper, gets 'really excited' to join other dogs outside in Orlando, Florida in the clip from October 14 where the owner said: 'He did not suffer any known injuries.'
